Package com.intellij.openapi.editor

Interface FoldingModel

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FoldingModelEx
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FoldingModelImpl

    public interface FoldingModel
    Provides services for controlling and getting information about folded regions in the editor.
    See Also:
    Editor.getFoldingModel()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default boolean addFoldRegion(FoldRegion region)
      Deprecated. 
      Does nothing
      FoldRegion addFoldRegion(int startOffset, int endOffset, java.lang.String placeholderText)
      Adds a fold region for the specified range of the document.
      FoldRegion [] getAllFoldRegions()
      Gets the list of all fold regions in the specified editor.
      FoldRegion getCollapsedRegionAtOffset(int offset)
      Returns collapsed folded region at a given offset or null if there's no such region.
      FoldRegion getFoldRegion(int startOffset, int endOffset)
      Returns fold region with given boundaries, if it exists, or null otherwise.
      boolean isOffsetCollapsed(int offset)
      Checks if the specified offset in the document belongs to a folded region.
      void removeFoldRegion(FoldRegion region)
      Removes the specified fold region.
      default void runBatchFoldingOperation(java.lang.Runnable operation)
      Runs an operation which is allowed to modify fold regions in the editor by calling addFoldRegion(int, int, String) and removeFoldRegion(FoldRegion).
      void runBatchFoldingOperation(java.lang.Runnable operation, boolean moveCaretFromCollapsedRegion)
      Deprecated. 
      Passing false for moveCaretFromCollapsedRegion might leave caret in an inconsistent state after the operation. Use runBatchFoldingOperation(Runnable) instead.
      void runBatchFoldingOperation(java.lang.Runnable operation, boolean allowMovingCaret, boolean keepRelativeCaretPosition)
      Performs folding model changes (creation/deletion/expanding/collapsing of fold regions).
      default void runBatchFoldingOperationDoNotCollapseCaret(java.lang.Runnable operation) 

    • Method Detail

      • addFoldRegion

        FoldRegion addFoldRegion(int startOffset,
                         int endOffset,
                         java.lang.String placeholderText)
        Adds a fold region for the specified range of the document. This method must be called from the Runnable passed to runBatchFoldingOperation(Runnable). The region is initially not folded.
        Parameters:
        startOffset - the start offset of the region to fold.
        endOffset - the end offset of the region to fold.
        placeholderText - the text to display instead of the region contents when the region is folded.
        Returns:
        the fold region, or null if folding is currently disabled or corresponding region cannot be added (e.g. if it intersects with another existing region)

      • addFoldRegion

        @Deprecated
default boolean addFoldRegion(FoldRegion region)
        Deprecated. Does nothing

      • removeFoldRegion

        void removeFoldRegion(FoldRegion region)
        Removes the specified fold region. This method must be called from the Runnable passed to runBatchFoldingOperation(Runnable).
        Parameters:
        region - the region to remove.

      • getAllFoldRegions

        FoldRegion [] getAllFoldRegions()
        Gets the list of all fold regions in the specified editor. Returned array is sorted according to RangeMarker.BY_START_OFFSET comparator, i.e. first by start offset, then by end offset.
        Returns:
        the array of fold regions, or an empty array if folding is currently disabled.

      • isOffsetCollapsed

        boolean isOffsetCollapsed(int offset)
        Checks if the specified offset in the document belongs to a folded region. The region must contain given offset or be located right after given offset, i.e. the following condition must hold: foldStartOffset <= offset < foldEndOffset.
        This method can return incorrect data if it's invoked in the context of runBatchFoldingOperation(Runnable) invocation.
        Parameters:
        offset - the offset to check.
        Returns:
        true if the offset belongs to a folded region, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        getCollapsedRegionAtOffset(int)

      • getCollapsedRegionAtOffset

        FoldRegion getCollapsedRegionAtOffset(int offset)
        Returns collapsed folded region at a given offset or null if there's no such region. Returned region will satisfy the following condition: region.getStartOffset() <= offset < region.getEndOffset()
        This method can return incorrect data if it's invoked in the context of runBatchFoldingOperation(Runnable) invocation.
        See Also:
        isOffsetCollapsed(int)

      • getFoldRegion

        FoldRegion getFoldRegion(int startOffset,
                         int endOffset)
        Returns fold region with given boundaries, if it exists, or null otherwise.

      • runBatchFoldingOperation

        default void runBatchFoldingOperation(java.lang.Runnable operation)
        Runs an operation which is allowed to modify fold regions in the editor by calling addFoldRegion(int, int, String) and removeFoldRegion(FoldRegion).
        Parameters:
        operation - the operation to execute.

      • runBatchFoldingOperation

        @Deprecated
void runBatchFoldingOperation(java.lang.Runnable operation,
                              boolean moveCaretFromCollapsedRegion)
        Deprecated. Passing false for moveCaretFromCollapsedRegion might leave caret in an inconsistent state after the operation. Use runBatchFoldingOperation(Runnable) instead.

      • runBatchFoldingOperationDoNotCollapseCaret

        default void runBatchFoldingOperationDoNotCollapseCaret(java.lang.Runnable operation)

      • runBatchFoldingOperation

        void runBatchFoldingOperation(java.lang.Runnable operation,
                              boolean allowMovingCaret,
                              boolean keepRelativeCaretPosition)
        Performs folding model changes (creation/deletion/expanding/collapsing of fold regions).
        Parameters:
        allowMovingCaret - If false, requests to collapse a region containing caret won't be processed. If true - corresponding operation will be performed with caret automatically moved to the region's start offset (original caret position is remembered and is restored on region expansion).
        keepRelativeCaretPosition - If true, editor scrolling position will be adjusted after the operation, so that vertical caret position will remain unchanged (if caret is not visible at operation start, top left corner of editor will be used as an anchor instead). If false, no scrolling adjustment will be done.
